thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Consider China in the Context of Nafta Talks

author: wsjcom
title: Consider China in the Context of Nafta Talks
text:
Regarding your editorial “The Nafta Ultimatum Strategy” (May 4): U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer could negotiate an updated North American Free Trade Agreement (Nafta) that retains the investor-state dispute settlement (ISDS) mechanism.
Nafta has been vital to America’s rise as an energy exporter. North America’s integrated energy markets have created economic incentives for the U.S. to invest in energy production and export more to Canada and Mexico. Mexico’s 2013 opening of its energy sector to foreign and domestic...
